html:
** Shares of major U.S. tech firms fall premarket ahead of a White House meeting with their top execs to discuss software security

** Oracle Corp ORCL.N down 1.8%, Alphabet Inc GOOGL.O down 0.5% before the bell

** Apple Inc AAPL.O, Meta Platforms Inc FB.O and Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O down nearly 0.2% each

** IBM IBM.N and Microsoft Corp MSFT.O nearly flat

** In Dec, the White House National Security Advisor sent a letter to CEOs of tech firms after the discovery of a security vulnerability in open-source software that organizations worldwide use to log data in their apps

** In attendance on Thursday's meet will be executives from GOOGL, FB, APPL, AMZN, IBM and MSFT (Full Story)


(Reporting by Yuvraj Malik in Bengaluru)

(( yuvraj.malik@thomsonreuters.com ))
